# Table表格虚拟滚动

`unconfirmed`

[https://ant-design.antgroup.com/components/table-cn#components-table-demo-virtual-list](https://ant-design.antgroup.com/components/table-cn#components-table-demo-virtual-list)

### Steps to reproduce

用shift 鼠标滚轮进行横向滚动

### What is expected?

### What is actually happening?

无法用shift 鼠标滚轮进行横向滚动
